The very last drawing is of a set of new born baby's bones. #gruesome #anatomymuseum #anatomy
Here's a flick through of some of my drawings: https://t.co/h23mAgH9mt
Apparently back in the day Edinburgh council used to donate gallons of whiskey to preserve the samples in!
...and an entire womb, Fallopian tubes an' all, even a tiny developing embryo. It was all grey and in a box of that preservative liquid.
...I drew the things that freaked me out the most: a mans entire head with a bit of the scalp chopped off in a box of liquid, brains, veins,
Visited the anatomy museum in the old medical school of Edinburgh University this morning...
Off to Newcastle for a meeting (& more importantly, to eat a burrito while talking at @AlexandraDavy) <3
